column4: Hi all, my server chowns files as www-data:www-data  it is possible to and my user to the www-data pool?
Hi all, my server chowns files as www-data:www-data  it is possible to ADD my user to the www-data pool?  (spelling mistake)
to add users to the group www-data, open up your users and groups panel, (system>administration>users and groups) and you can edit groups and add users to them.
